text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Ugh wait weren’t you the one that said on Fox News ..... “the Coronavirus won’t come here”?!?!  Now you’re the Press Secretary?!?  Finished the video waiting for trump.....BTW wasn’t that host just fired from Fox News for LYING?!? https://t.co/rU3VnU2Xop
